h2_title: Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell
content: This next area is a fairly quick one, but it’s also very important for a few different reasons. Before moving on from the Shrine, be sure to look across from it for a tall tree with yellow flowers hanging from it, and gather the ‘’’Luojia Fragrant Vine’’’.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bamboo Grove Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell' and the sub-subsection 'Marsh of the White Mist'.
The content is as follows:
This next area is a fairly quick one, but it’s also very important for a few different reasons. Before moving on from the Shrine, be sure to look across from it for a tall tree with yellow flowers hanging from it, and gather the ‘’’Luojia Fragrant Vine’’’.
